page.title: 14A Local Shop
page.content: A.Voss is the main general store for Baltasound and because of its position on the island is the biggest and most well used of the island shops. It is known locally as Skibhoul as this was the building's original name. It has petrol pumps and sells most things. It is open Tuesday's - Saturdays and has 5 full time and 2 part-time workers. A bakery is also attached. The older workers in the shop have been there many years but there are some young girls who are in their first job. The shop is busiest in summer with tourists visiting the island. Most people shop there at some time during the week and many thought the prices were a bit expensive which is a common complaint due to the expense of bringing goods to such a remote area.
